GisGeometryStreamReader Class Reference

#include <GeometryStreamReader.h>

Inherits GisIDisposable.

Inheritance diagram for GisGeometryStreamReader:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisGeometryStreamReader class is a reader for serialized geometric data (abstract). The data source is defined by the implementation. GisGeometryStreamReader is a helper type and does not inherit from GisIGeometry.

Definition at line 35 of file GeometryStreamReader.h.
